data.title: Kalka Group of Institutions
data.meta_description: A Glimpse of Kalka Group of Institutions. Kalka Education Society, Kalka Group, Kalka Delhi, Kalka Meerut, Kalka Dental College, KPS Delhi, Kalka Public School
data.text:
Kalka Group of Institutions provides the best Modern Infrastructure, the best curriculum, and the best environment for the development of its students. The teachers put in unerring dedication in achieving the target of providing holistic education to children of all age's groups.

Our Vision

To strive for congenial environment with an objective to nurture the pleasures of discovery, leaning, expression and communication, thereby maximizing the intellectual capacity and sensitivity of all students.

To prepare today's students to be tomorrow's innovators.

To enhance student's knowledge base, confidence and analytical skills and thereby develop their ability to succeed in this ever so competitive world.

Our Mission

To prepare children to become self-reliant and productive individuals.

To kindle the imagination of leaners and develop their 21st century spills.

To sensitize them about society and act as a good human being.

To groom them for life ling leaning.

KGI believes in the innate strength of each leaner i.e., to see that there is a bright child in each one. Therefore, the whole school programme is based on the inclusion of essential skills mapped under this philosophy. It provides enough opportunities to learners to develop in each of the physical, social, emotional, and intellectual areas of development. 'ACT' which means Attitude, Communication and Skills, is incorporated in the school philosophy to foster, and enhance opportunities and challenges for the leaners. All multi-disciplinary scholastic and activities emphasise upon the regular practice and harmonious implementation of 'ACT' so that it becomes a worthy habit and finally the character of a real 'Smart Kpite'. The essence of teaching is to enhance ideas and progressively transcend it to greater height of attainment.
